title: A Look Back: Huge Waves!
content: Today's waves are record setting! 10 foot waves coming from the south and heading to the north. Hide your kids, hide your wife. Don't come out without your board! It's a record setting day of surfing that went down in the history books. Don't miss this recount of the biggest surfing day in Carmel, CA.

title: Feature Article: Johnny Smith
content: Listen to local professional surfer, Johnny Smith, talk about the ups and downs of having a career in professional surfing. Johnny shares insight into his surfing philosophy, how he ended up where he is, and where he's planning on going.

title: Tips: How to Catch the Waves You Want
content: Local surfing instructor shares his secrets to watching the ocean and catching the waves that are worth your effort. Being choosy is an advantage with this strategy and will ensure a fun and fulfilling day of surfing.

title: Feature Article: Attacked by a Shark and Still Surfing
content: Our own hometown hero shares the terrifying story about a nearly fatal shark attack that took an arm but only fanned the fire of passion for a surfer's craft. This article shows us that even in the face of adversity, there is much to live for and much to achieve.
